column3: Translations should be done on [transifex](https://www.transifex.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/). Changes to translations in pull requests will end up being overwritten by the next pull from transifex.
Indeed, please send translation changes upstream.
@achow101 @fanquake FYI:  I asked @rex4539 in PR #12593 to move these changes into a separate Pull Request.  It's good to know about https://www.transifex.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/ -- thanks.
I have already started entering the changes in transifex.
